issue.title: [CI][Crossbow] Nightly conda osx builds fail
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7189](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7189). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://dev.azure.com/ursa-labs/crossbow/_build/results?buildId=2771&view=logs&jobId=cf796865-97b7-5cd1-be8e-6e00ce4fd8cf&taskId=88ee2fb8-46fd-5c68-fde3-1c8d31ba2a5f&lineStart=3250&lineEnd=3251&colStart=1&colEnd=1

`Symbol not found: __ZN5arrow8internal22StringToFloatConverter4Impl16main_junk_value_E`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7189?focusedCommentId=17001798) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
This seems to have been fixed, perhaps in some other ticket.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7189?focusedCommentId=17585796) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
